[php]

<script>  
    $(function(){  
        $('#button').click(function(){  
            var pid=$('#select').val();  
           // alert(pid);  
            var start=$('.start').val();  
            var over=$('.over').val();  
  
  
            $.getJSON("b.php",{pid:pid,start:start,over:over},function(msg){  
  
  
                var str='';  
                for(var i=0;i<msg['arr'].length;i++)  
                {  
                    str=str+"<tr><td>"+msg['arr'][i].name+"</td></tr>";  
                }  
                $('div').html(str);  
            })  
        })  
    })  
  
</script>
